Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The map in the Forgotten Temple showed
a geoglyph <clr:0000>shaped like a castle<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The map in the Forgotten Temple showed
a geoglyph that <clr:0000>looks like a stone tablet<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The map in the Forgotten Temple showed
a geoglyph <clr:0000>shaped like a monster<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Greeting_01>Hm?<sp:5:1:0> This is the last place I expected to
find you, courageous one.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>I came to investigate the local geoglyph,
but the sandstorm scuttled my plans.

Now that it has finally died down, I intend
to resume my search.
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The map in the Forgotten Temple showed
a geoglyph <clr:0000>shaped like a person<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Trouble>There is also the matter of the temple at
the bottom of the canyon in Hebra.<sp:0:4:0>Cado has been studying the relevant
literature and is certain it will aid us
in our search for the geoglyphs.<sp:0:4:0>Clearly, we must investigate this
<clr:0000>Forgotten Temple<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>We are on a journey to find every
geoglyph depicted on that map.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Poor Cado had a miserable time copying
the whole thing down.<sp:0:4:0>If only we had a camera, he could have
been spared a lot of effort...

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_01>Oh well. No use worrying about that now.
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Trouble>We have heard of geoglyphs all across
Hyrule...<sp:5:1:0>but our search for them has been
haphazard at best.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Perhaps a visit to the <clr:0000>Forgotten Temple<clr:ffff>
in that canyon in Hebra could provide us
better guidance.
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now, I must finish my preparations and
reunite with Cado.<sp:0:4:0>I've left him waiting at the entrance to
town for so long, I will be half-surprised
if he has not left without me.
